channel.title: FAQ: Umm I need teh know these things
channel.description:
Many of you posted rude things on my post & I dont like it although I do like the suggestions :o. What I wanted to say was:
[b][u]-=-What is-=-[/u][/b]
[ul][li]Render?[/li] [li]Gradient Map?[/li] [li]The best website TuT?[/li] [li]Best Brushes?[/li][/ul]
TYSM much viewing this and helping me out. Really need teh know cuz people say my sigs suck (god dammit I said I was a beginner ffs...) :o.

item.title: FAQ: Umm I need teh know these things
item.dc:creator: @Greek_Line Greek Line
item.source: FAQ: Umm I need teh know these things

item.title: FAQ: Umm I need teh know these things
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:2, topic:81229”][ul][li]Render?[/li][/ul]

A render is a cut out image image of some stock.

[ul][li]Gradient Map?[/li][/ul]

Its a tool on ps that covers the layer with a certain amount of colors with the affects given.

[ul][li]The best website TuT?[/li][/ul]

Go to GameRenders and find one
[list][s]
[ul][li]Best Brushes?[/li][/ul]

Go to devient art if you want brushes, they have a nice selection.[/quote][/s]

Read full topic
item.source: FAQ: Umm I need teh know these things

item.title: FAQ: Umm I need teh know these things

@Greek_Line wrote:

Really need teh know cuz people say my sigs suck (god dammit I said I was a beginner ffs…) :o.
[/quote]
Don’t pay any attention to these fags that think they know stuff.
Good old exe got your questions done quick eh?[/quote]
No…Actually I was happy he replyed
